poke_power.name: Baby Evolution
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Roselia from your hand onto Budew (this counts as evolving Budew) and remove all damage counters from Budew.

poke_body.name: Poison Enzyme
poke_body.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Budew by your opponent’s Poisoned Pokémon.

attacks.name: Buddy-buddy
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
